name: Singed
title: the Mad Chemist
lore: Singed is a Zaunite alchemist of unmatched intellect, who has devoted his life to pushing the boundaries of knowledge—with no price, even his own sanity, too high to pay. Is there a method to his madness? His concoctions rarely fail, but it appears to many that Singed has lost all sense of humanity, leaving a toxic trail of misery and terror in his wake.
blurb: Singed is a Zaunite alchemist of unmatched intellect, who has devoted his life to pushing the boundaries of knowledge—with no price, even his own sanity, too high to pay. Is there a method to his madness? His concoctions rarely fail, but it appears to...
allytips: Poison Trail is very effective at farming and harassing, allowing Singed to dominate the flow of whatever lane he's in.
Use Insanity Potion to trick your opponents into chasing you through your Poison Trail.
Flinging enemies into your tower can deal heavy amounts of damage to them.
enemytips: Keep your distance to avoid being Flung back into Singed's allies.
Singed needs to run close to your team to be effective. Try to take advantage of this by using crowd control effects on him while attacking his allies.
Be careful when chasing Singed. He's very difficult to bring down, and can leave his Poison Trail to damage you in your pursuit.

riot_spell_q.name: Poison Trail
riot_spell_q.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.
riot_spell_q.tooltip: <spellPassive>Toggle: </spellPassive>Singed lays a poisonous trail that deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ charabilitypower*4 }})</scaleAP> magic damage per second.

riot_spell_w.name: Mega Adhesive
riot_spell_w.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Singed leaves a sticky area on the ground for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the area are slowed by {{ e1 }}% and grounded, prohibiting the use of Movement abilities.

If Singed flings a target into the zone, it will root them.

riot_spell_e.name: Fling
riot_spell_e.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage. Max 300 bonus damage against minions and monsters.

If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted for {{ e2 }} second(s).

riot_spell_r.name: Insanity Potion
riot_spell_r.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.
riot_spell_r.tooltip: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him {{ statamount }} Ability Power, Armor, Magic Resist, Movement Speed, Health Regen, and Mana Regen for {{ duration }} seconds.

riot_spell_i.name: Noxious Slipstream
riot_spell_i.description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of movement speed when passing them.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Noxious Slipstream
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of movement speed when passing them.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Moving near a {{tip|champion}} grants '''Singed''' {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds. The effects of ''Noxious Slipstream'' can stack up to 25 times.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Poison Trail
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Toggle:}} '''Singed''' leaves a {{tip|poison}} cloud behind him for {{fd|3.25}} seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: Enemies standing in the cloud's trail are {{tip|poison|poisoned}} for 2 seconds, taking {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds for the duration, continually refreshing while remaining in the affected area.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling2: {{st|Magic Damage per {{fd|0.25}} Seconds|{{ap|5 to 15}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|5*8 to 15*8}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* ''Poison Trail'' interacts with {{ai|Twin Fang|Cassiopeia}}.
* Toggling ''Poison Trail'' on/off does not trigger {{nie|Spellblade}} or charge {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Mega Adhesive
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Singed''' covers the target area with a potent adhesive for 3 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} by 60% and {{tip|ground|grounding}} all enemies within.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Fling
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Singed''' {{tip|airborne|flings}} the target enemy over his shoulder 550 units, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, capped against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|50 to 110}} {{as|(+ {{ap|6 to 8}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}|Maximum Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|350 to 410}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_e1.description2: Targets flung into {{ais|Mega Adhesive|Singed}} area of effect are temporarily {{tip|root|rooted}}.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* ''Singed'' laughs during ''Fling's'' displacement.
* ''Fling's'' target is disabled for {{tt|1 second|Estimated}} while being displaced.
** Enemies using {{si|Flash}} during ''Fling's'' cast time will still be entirely affected (damage, disabling, displacement).
* ''Fling'' can make enemies go over walls (circumstances permitting).
* ''Fling'' will always attempt to displace enemies so they land behind ''Singed''.
** Enemies may sometimes be displaced sideways if ''Singed'' approached them diagonally (caused by him not facing in their direction when casting ''Fling'').
* Possible bug: Slow-immune enemies will not be {{tip|root|rooted}} when flung into {{ai|Mega Adhesive|Singed}}.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Insanity Potion
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Singed''' drinks a potent chemical brew, gaining {{sti|ap|{{as|'''bonus''' ability power}}}}, {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}}, {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}, {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' health regeneration}}}}, and {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' mana regeneration}}}}, all for the next 25 seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling:
{{st|Bonus Stats|{{ap|30 to 80}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Regeneration per Second|{{ap|6 to 16}}|Total Regeneration|{{ap|6*25 to 16*25}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.notes: * ''Insanity Potion'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Singed's'' previous orders.
